cinema.employee_controllers

Class WhatsOnEmpController

  • Object
    • WhatsOnCustController
      • WhatsOnEmpController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookingController

    public class WhatsOnEmpController
extends WhatsOnCustController
    Controller class for the employee what's on page. It extends the controller for the customer what's on page. Calls the super.initialize method to lay out the page with all the film showings. Extends the initialize method of it's parent, to delete the booking button and replace it with a 'booking information' button - employees can view the film bookings but not book themselves.
    Author:
    carolinesmith, daianabassi
    See Also:
    cinema.customer_controllers.WhatsOnCustController

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(URL location,
                       ResourceBundle resources)
        Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed. Parses 'film.xml' and lays out the information for each film in a gridpane. Sets the central VBox with a vertical list of gridpanes (films). Removes the book button from the parent class and replaces with a booking information button.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface Initializable
        Overrides:
        initialize in class WhatsOnCustController
